subject_terms_3: Photography City Hall (Singapore) Former Supreme Court (Singapore) Padang (Singapore) Colonial architecture
physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features the padang in the foreground, with a tree on the left. In the distant, there is the Old Supreme Court building in the center of the photograph. The building has a large dome structure on the left, and rows of tall columns along the front. There are no tears or folds seen on the photograph.
sgcool_label_text: George Lowe was a member of the British Expedition that saw Sir Edmund Hillary scale Mount Everest on 29 May 1953. In September that year, Lowe accompanied Hillary on a visit to Singapore to deliver their first Everest lecture outside of New Zealand at the Odeon Theatre to an audience of 1,620 schoolchildren. This photograph album, with the coat of arms of the City of Singapore in gilt on the cover, was presented to Lowe as a souvenir of his visit.
title_text: Photograph album presented to George Lowe as a souvenir of his visit to Singapore George Lowe album: Photograph of former Supreme Court building
subject_terms_2: Photographs Photograph albums Souvenir Lowe, George, 1924-2013 Hillary, Edmund, 1919-2008 Architecture, Colonial Padang, The (Singapore)
